title._content: Image taken from page 301 of 'Three Years in Western China; a narrative of three journeys in Ssǔ-ch'uan, Keui-chow, and Yün-nan ... With an introduction by Archibald Little. [With illustrations and map.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Three Years in Western China; a narrative of three journeys in Ssǔ-ch'uan, Keui-chow, and Yün-nan ... With an introduction by Archibald Little. [With illustrations and map.]" Author: HOSIE, Alexander - Sir Contributor: LITTLE, Archibald John. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010057.ee.10.", "British Library OC ORW.1986.a.3740" Page: 301 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1890 Publisher: G. Philip & Son Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001740337 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
